General.Name: Campina Ice Cream Industry Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Campina Ice Cream Industry, Tbk. processes and produces ice creams in Indonesia. It offers cone, cup, family pack, and stick ice creams. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Rungkut Industri II/15-17, Surabaya, Indonesia, 60292
